title: BRIEF-Monarch Gold Corp Says Q4 Revenues Of $7.3 Mln From Sale Of 2,666 Ounces Of Gold Combined With Revenue From Custom Milling
text:
BRIEF-Monarch Gold Corp Says Q4 Revenues Of $7.3 Mln From Sale Of 2,666 Ounces Of Gold Combined With Revenue From Custom Milling

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 07:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Monarch Gold Corp Says Q4 Revenues Of $7.3 Mln From Sale Of 2,666 Ounces Of Gold Combined With Revenue From Custom Milling Sept 27 (Reuters) - Monarch Gold Corp : * MONARCH GOLD REPORTS ITS 2019 FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END RESULTS * MONARCH GOLD CORP - Q4 REVENUES OF $7.3 MILLION FROM SALE OF 2,666 OUNCES OF GOLD COMBINED WITH REVENUE FROM CUSTOM MILLING * MONARCH GOLD CORP - Q4 NET INCOME OF $0.9 MILLION OR $0.005 PER SHARE, DILUTED * MONARCH GOLD CORP - CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS OF $6.4 MILLION AT JUNE 30, 2019 * MONARCH GOLD - ONGOING DISCUSSIONS WITH POTENTIAL PARTNERS FOR WASAMAC GOLD PROJECT , IMPLEMENTATION OF STRATEGY TO DEVELOP OTHER ADVANCED GOLD PROJECTS

BRIEF-Monarch Gold Corp Says Q4 Revenues Of $7.3 Mln From Sale Of 2,666 Ounces Of Gold Combined With Revenue From Custom Milling
